root: ^An Open Source Unity Visual Novel framework made with Ink.
^My name is Erin and I'll teach you how to work with this framework quickly!

Introduction: ^Bungaku is a Visual Novel framework built above **Ink**, a narrative scripting language.
^This framework provides basic functionality to make a Visual Novel game, so you don't have to make a fully functional system from scratch.
Credits: ^Bungaku is made by a fellow Weeb named Bayu Satiyo.
